articles.title: Oil price blasts past $111 ahead of Opec meeting; Sberbank’s European arm closed – business live - The Guardian
articles.description: FTSE 100 rises while European shares are down, rouble drops and Moscow stock exchange stays shut for third day, as Russia bombards Ukrainian cities

articles.title: Europe's joint Mars mission with Russia postponed by war - 1News
articles.description: While Europe has its own rockets to put satellites into orbit, it relies on Russian and American partners to send astronauts into space.
articles.content:
The launch of a joint Europe-Russia mission to Mars this year is now very unlikely due to sanctions linked to the war in Ukraine, the European Space Agency said on Tuesday.

articles.title: FIFA suspends Russia from World Cup, UEFA throws teams out of European competition - ESPN
articles.description: Russia have been kicked out of the 2022 World Cup in Qatar by FIFA and clubs have been suspended following the invasion of Ukraine.
